extendedInfo.description: Realistic fishing for your Android device!  Hold and flick your phone just like a fishing rod, and mimic the same movements that you would in real life when casting, retrieving the lure, and fighting the fish. Fishin' 2 Go takes advantage of your phone's accelerometer and vibrator to give you the most realistic fishing experience possible.Features:Physical controls using the accelerometer (casting, etc).Realistic fish behavior & intelligence.17 scenic fresh & saltwater locations to choose from including the Amazon River and Pacific Ocean.125 different species of fish to catch using 100 different lures/baits.Customize your gear setup with different line weights & hook sizes.Points currency system: Catch fish to get points to purchase new lures and locationsComplete all challenges for a location to unlock new ones.Compete with friends and family by saving your best catches, and send prize photos through email, messaging, Facebook, etc.4 different difficulty settings ensures a fun experience for anglers of all levelsA new "Preschoolers" setting will turn your little ones into fishing fanatics, and is guaranteed to keep them entertained and occupied.Compare your biggest fish with other Fishin' 2 Go users through the new and improved web records system.Try the free LITE version in the Market first!"Read Phone State" permission is needed to allow all users to post web records. This is only used by the game when a user posts a web record, so that the game can anonymously associate a device with it's respective catches in the web records system. Personally identifiable information is never sent, shared, or stored.

reviews.title: Was fun but fail
reviews.comment: Gives me error and tell me to delete and reinstall. Did that three times fix and ill give five stars. Play everyday.
reviews.author: Chueyee Vue

reviews.title: Needs updated for 4.0
reviews.comment: They still apparently haven\'t updated the app to work on Android 4.0. Still won\'t work on my Galaxy Nexus. Worked great on my moto droid
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fishin\' 2 Go ...its worth 6 *S*T*A*R*S* !
reviews.comment: UPDATE 6/16/13 - Would love to be able to play this on my Nexus-7 and Galaxy S4. Apparently it needs to be updated for android version 4.0 and above. Both my devices are running 4.2.2 and Google Play reports incompatible. Great \"Paid For\" game that I\'m missing!.......      The first line of the game description says it all.. \"If you like fishing, you will love this game\

reviews.title: she
reviews.comment: the game is very challenging just like real life fishing. ..and the kids mode is great too, they enjoy it.
reviews.author: sarah jimiera

reviews.title: Doesn\'t respond
reviews.comment: Was working well but now doesn\'t respond to motion, my phone doesn\'t have this issue with other apps, please fix cuz I enjoy this game

reviews.title: Fix
reviews.comment: Having problems with line snapping within seconds after hooking fish first problem I\'ve ever had

reviews.comment: The first game yet to give no problems, no freezing, no force closes, some of the fish shouldn\'t be in the regions they\'re in, but still a great game

reviews.title: Angry customer
reviews.comment: Can\'t cast or make the rod change angles. Used to love playing this game. I would like a refund now though unless they can fix the problems.

reviews.title: Great fishing game
reviews.comment: What else can I say? it lets you catch madd fish.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No Longer Under Active Development
reviews.comment: Worked great on my old phone and was a blast so I purchased the full version. I\'ve since upgraded my phone and installed this app, only to have it not work, even though there is no warning in their description about only working on older phones. I found out it is no longer under active development from an auto response when I emailed the developer. I am very disappointed and I probably won\'t be purchasing anything else by this developer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unplayable on Nexus 4G
reviews.comment: Works the first time then crashes every time after.  Reported weeks ago and still no response from support.  Very disappointed. This didn\'t happen on the trial version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love the game, just needs more blue Marlins and other fish that you can actually catch.

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: One of the few games that will play on my phone problem free, but it could be due to the fact that I own a 4g phone from Sprint \"The Not Right Now Network!\" In a 3g area! There answer for everything....Not Right Now! There\'s a slogan in there somewhere.
